name: Silent Escape Beta
description:
Silent Escape

Silent Escape is a game made by a group of students as a game jam project where you play a unknown person who need to escape from some monsters who react to sound. During your evasion you will have to complete various puzzle to be able to continue

For now the game only have 9 levels but we are planning on adding more of them, if you have any sugjestions make sure to comment !

Peoples working on this project :

- https://itch.io/profile/mozner
